title: Tamil National Alliance – LTTE separatist manifestos – 2001, 2004, 2010 and now 2013
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Separatism and TNA go hand in hand. Its election manifestos of 2001, 2004, 2010 and now 2013 see no major difference. There is no major difference in the fact that Tamils have kept on voting for the TNA despite its allegiance to the LTTE. What must be also…
